name: SOMEDAY
description:
Description



『Someday』is a otaku-to-leisure puzzle game where you can complete the game by choosing different conversations and routes.
There is no unlock time and rating system in the game, and you can fully devote yourself to a happy mood. (๑•̀ᄇ•́)و✧

What happened to the female teacher’s day? Going to work, going shopping or at home, it’s up to you!
